mdRecord.dcterms:description: Identifies men from his company killed or captured at Gettysburg. Describes attack on Baltimore and Ohio Railroad at Martinsburg. Says Lee will remain at Winchester until army is refitted. Asks for clothing and food. Says religious faith of army still good, wishes it were better.
There are three files available: a PDF transcription, a plain text transcription, and a PDF which was created from scans of the original document.
